projects.name: ArgentBank
projects.description: Project ArgentBank implements front-end for a banking website. Integrates functions like user authentification and transaction display, and uses React and Redux Toolkit for state management.

projects.name: Agence immobiliere
projects.description: Project Kasa is a front-end for a real estate agency that rents properties for short or long term accomodation. KASA is a complete rewrite of a website that was previously implemented in ASP.NET. This updated version is build with React.

projects.name: Sophie Bluel
projects.description: Project Sophie Bluel consisted of debugging of a pre-existing website, to ensure correct presentation and dynamic behaviour like sorting and image sliding. Website is coded in React.

projects.name: OhMyFood
projects.description: Project OhMyFood is a mobile-first website that lists menus of gourmet restaurants. Includes reservation system and possibility to compose your menu ahead of restaurant visit. Website is built with HTML and CSS and shows various front-end animations.

projects.name: Booki
projects.description: Project Booki consisted of coding frontend for travel agency using HTML and CSS. Website shows many elements that scale and move, depending on the screen resolution. The site is responsive in every aspect and implements complex HTML and CSS.

projects.name: Print It!
projects.description: Project Print It! consisted of implementing a dynamic element in form of a slider of images in the website header. Uses HTML, CSS and Javascript for the slider.

skills_text: Install a front-end development environment
Integrate content according to a template using HTML and CSS
Implement a responsive interface with HTML and CSS
Develop a web interface with Sass
Implementing CSS animations
Version your project with Git and Github
Manipulating DOM elements with JavaScript
Retrieving user data in JavaScript via forms
Managing user events with JavaScript
Monitor project progress using a project management tool
Present a technical solution
Break down functionalities into tasks to prepare for development
Implement a technology watch method
Write technical specifications for a web project based on functional requirements
Develop website interface elements using React components
Initialize an application with Create React App
Configure navigation between application pages with React Router
Optimizing website performance with Google Rich Snippet, Wave and Lighthouse extension
SEARCH ENGINE OPTIMIZATION (SEO)
ACCESSIBILITY OPTIMIZATION
Debugging a website with Chrome DevTools
Displaying back-end data on the interface via API calls
Configure API routes for client/server communication
Implement data management with Redux to ensure front-end operation
Deploying a static site online
me_description: I am a passionate software engineer that specializes in developing modern, responsive and SEO optimized websites with React and Typescript. Currently based in France I am looking for exciting opportunities in my home country or with foreign companies. I have successfully completed an associate's degree in the field of web development in France. This practical training consisted of coding 12 projects of increasing complexity and allowed me to obtain solid skills in core technologies for web development, e.g. HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Typescript, React, Redux and others.
